properties.name: spring-boot-gwt.scheduled-database-reset
properties.description: Reset the database with in a given interval with given initial values.

properties.name: spring-boot-gwt.scheduled-database-reset-interval-millis
properties.description: The interval in milliseconds to reset the database.

properties.name: spring-boot-gwt.initial-todo-items
properties.description: The initial values to insert after the scheduled database reset.
